svg.showSvg.title: Preview SVG
configuration.completion.showAdvanced.ti: Show advanced items in completion list.
configuration.completion.showAdvanced.de: Specifies whether advanced items that are not commonly used are displayed in the AutoComplete list.
Show deprecated items in completion list.
Specifies whether advanced items that are deprecated are displayed in the AutoComplete list.
configuration.format.convertColors.title: Convert colors to #rrggbb.
configuration.format.convertColors.descr: Specifies whether formatting converts colors to #rrggbb.
Specifies whether formatting converts shapes to equivalent `path` elements.
configuration.format.convertTransform.de: Specifies whether formatting converts `transform` attributes to equivalent matrices.
configuration.format.mergePaths.title: Merge `path` tags.
configuration.format.mergePaths.descript: Specifies whether formatting merges paths into one when possible.
configuration.format.removeComments.desc: Specifies whether formatting removes comments in the documents.
configuration.format.removeDesc.title: Remove `desc` tag.
configuration.format.removeDesc.descript: Specifies whether formatting removes document description tags.
configuration.format.removeDoctype.title: Remove doctype.
configuration.format.removeDoctype.descr: Specifies whether formatting remove the document doctype.
configuration.format.removeMetadata.desc: Specifies whether formatting removes document metadata tags.
configuration.format.sortAttrs.title: Sort tag attributes.
configuration.format.sortAttrs.descripti: Specifies whether formatting sorts tag attributes in a specific order.
configuration.version.title: SVG Version
configuration.version.description: Specifies the SVG standard version that will be used for autocompletion and validation.
